Goldkinder (German for "gold children") is the third studio album by German deathcore band We Butter the Bread with Butter, considering their EP- Projekt Herz, the second album. It was released on 9 August 2013. The album entered the German Media Control chart at No. 27.

Their first single Pyroman & Astronaut hit #16 at German MetalRock Charts.[8]

The song Meine Brille appeared in the BBC Radio 1 playlist. It is the first appearance of WBTBWB in the BBC Radio.[9]
